title: Health King President's Super Energy Herb Tea | Health King
description: Health King® President's Super Energy Herb Tea is a premium grade herb tea made of wild Astragalus (root & leaf), Codonopsis Root and top quality Panax Ginseng, from the pollution-free primitive forest of Northeast China, combined with other precious herbs. This Traditional Chinese herbalism formula helps to support a healthy immune system, kidney fuction, memory, vitality & stamina. Maintain a pleasant & relaxed mood.

This Traditional Chinese herbalism formula helps to support a healthy immune system, kidney fuction, memory, vitality & stamina. Maintain a pleasant & relaxed mood.
